nodes.text: Grub toads were a creature that the Tulgah witch Morag threatened to turn her beast into if it did not chase after the Ewoks Kneesaa a Jari Kintaka and Wicket Warrick.
Grub toads were mentioned in the twelfth issue of the Ewoks comic series, which was written by David Manak and published on December 2, 1986.
